name: Doom of Doubs
description:
Originaly for the Arcadia Gamejam 3.

The theme was Loop so again I took it litteraly in many french and english puns.

The game is fully in english. Don't hesitate to ring me anywhere if there's a problem.

Wanting to keep the surprise, the game will have a full presentation a week after release~

[EDIT] I fixed the resolution issues, and improved a bit the in game performance.
